item.title: About Me
item.description:
Hello and welcomeðŸ‘‹ !

I’m a senior front-end engineer with over 7 years of experience building products and leading teams at leading tech companies (ByteDance and Xiaomi).

My expertise lies in designing architectures and optimizing performance for complex mobile apps (H5, Hybrid, React Native).

I have deep hands-on experience with React, TypeScript, and cross-platform tech stacks, and I enjoy using solid engineering practices and performance tuning to create smoother experiences for users and help teams ship better products, faster.
